## utils.isTargetInput() function

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Use Blockly.browserEvents.isTargetInput instead.  Blockly.utils.isTargetInput
> 

Returns true if this event is targeting a text input widget?

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isTargetInput(e: Event): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  e | Event | An event.  True if text input. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
